name: SupportEphraimAndMyrrh
_source: speak;Ephraim;Myrrh!|I'm happy to see you.|You're still so young.|Don't push yourself too hard today, all right?
speak;Myrrh;I won't...|I have a favor to ask.|Do you have time for me?
speak;Ephraim;Don't be nervous, Myrrh.|You can ask me anything.
speak;Myrrh;...I was watching you and Eirika together.|You looked so close.
speak;Ephraim;Of course we're close.|She is my sister, after all.
speak;Myrrh;I envy her.|I...wish that I had a brother like you.|That's why I ask...|Even if just for this journey...|Please be my brother.
speak;Ephraim;I don't know what to say...|I wasn't expecting you to ask anything like that...
speak;Myrrh;No...?|I'm sorry.|I should not have asked...
speak;Ephraim;Oh...|No, Myrrh...|Wait. I'm not saying no.
speak;Ephraim;Uhhh...|Sure.|Of course.|If it will make you happy.
speak;Myrrh;Yes...|It does.|I'll come speak with you again soon...Brother.
speak;Ephraim;Oh, my...|Eirika...|Myrrh...|How can I say no to that look?|I guess sisters are my weakness.
speak;Ephraim;Myrrh, don't you find that to be a little awkward?
speak;Ephraim;I mean...|You're a dragon, correct?|And if I'm right, you're also far older than I am...
speak;Myrrh;That's correct...|So, should I be your big sister?
speak;Ephraim;Well, that doesn't seem right, either.|You look so much younger than I do.|That would be odd...
speak;Ephraim;...Let's not dwell on this.|“Sister” will be fine.|Well.|Did you have something you wanted to ask me?
speak;Myrrh;I did...|You see, Brother, I have a favor to ask of you.
speak;Myrrh;In the forest...I was always with my father.|Even when I slept, he was there, watching over me.
speak;Myrrh;So...Brother.|Would you...stay with me at night and watch over me?
speak;Ephraim;No!|Myrrh, I understand your insecurity, but this simply is not acceptable.|Especially when we are on the march.

speak;Ephraim;Oh, don't look so sad.|When you see Eirika next, why don't you ask her?|I'm sure she will agree.|If you and I are brother and sister, then surely you and she are sisters, too.|How does that sound?
speak;Ephraim;Hey, Myrrh...|When this war is over...|What will you do?|Have you thought about where you will go?
speak;Myrrh;I've lived in Darkling Woods ever since I was a child.|I think that I shall spend the rest of my life there.
speak;Ephraim;On your own?|Do you have anyone waiting for you in the forest?
speak;Myrrh;I...|I am on my own now.|But you need not worry.|I am a dragon, after all.
speak;Ephraim;I've been thinking, Myrrh.|If you would like, you can live with us in Renais.
speak;Ephraim;When this war is over...|When we restore peace to Magvel...|Eirika and I will be going back to Renais to lead our people.|Would you like to live in the castle?|With us?
speak;Myrrh;Oh, but...|I would not want to inconvenience you.

speak;Ephraim;It's nothing you need worry about.|Castle Renais is a vast place.|I'm sure we could spare a room for a small girl like you.|And besides, you are my sister, right?|Family should stay together, don't you think?
speak;Myrrh;But...you must not forget that I am a dragon.|I must think about it.|I would love to, but...|perhaps I shouldn't, and so...|I must think about it.
speak;Myrrh;But...|Thank you for the offer.|It makes me very happy.|Thank you, Brother.
